pr_title: DHFPROD-6290:Original gradle properties get reset if runAsUser() is called

timeline.bodyText:
I think it would be better to construct a new Properties object and copy everything from "props" into it, then override mlUsername/mlPassword. That ensures we don't modify the set of Properties that were actually read from disk.
Good catch though figuring this out.
timeline.author: rjrudin
